name: luvamia Skorts Skirts for Women Denim Mini Skirt Side Slit with High Waisted Jean Shorts Stretchy
reviews:
The media could not be loaded.
                
            
                
            
            
        
    
    
Purchased this jean skirt for a bachelorette party. Sadly my package was delayed by Amazon so I wasn't able to wear it for the party, but I did get to wear it later for this review. The skirt has some positive features, but there are a few drawbacks worth considering before hitting "Buy Now". Firstly, I absolutely loved the soft and stretchable material. It is 70% cotton which is fabulous. It easily formed around my body, providing a comfortable fit that would likely suit various body shapes. The functioning pockets were a practical addition and are pretty deep. I could definitely fit my smartphone. I also appreciate the side slit, which adds that extra something and makes the skirt pop more. The inclusion of shorts underneath is a God sent, ensuring I don't accidentally give anyone a sneak peek while sitting and moving around.As I mentioned there were a couple of downsides to note. Firstly, the price seemed a bit steep at $31, especially considering it is a no-name brand on Amazon. With so many other no-name online clothing suppliers $31 isn't realistic for this skirt in my opinion. Additionally, as someone with thicker thighs, I experienced some issues with the shorts riding up slightly in the groin area while walking, requiring occasional readjustment. Another drawback was a weird fold that occurred in the lower back area with the fabric, which wasn't a huge deal but is somewhat unflattering especially considering how much I'm paying for this skirt. Overall the skirt was a great material and I love the design but this is simply not worth the price in my opinion, I think $20 would be more reasonable for this skirt.
date.of.review: Reviewed in the United States on 13 June 2023
